      • getDigest

        default byte[] getDigest(F file,
                         java.lang.String algorithm)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Gets (or calculates) the hash digest of a file. The algorithms "MD5", "SHA-1" and "SHA-256" are required to be implemented
        Parameters:
        file - The file object
        algorithm - The digest algorithm
        Returns:
        The hash digest
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - When the algorithm is not implement
        java.io.IOException - When an error occurs

      • getParent

        F getParent(F file)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the parent directory of a file. This method should check for file access permissions
        Parameters:
        file - The file object
        Returns:
        The parent file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there's no permission to access the file

      • findFile

        F findFile(java.lang.String path)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Finds a file based on the path. This method should check for file access permissions
        Parameters:
        path - The path
        Returns:
        The found file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there's no permission to access the file or the file doesn't exist

        path - The path
